title: Australia calling
brief_description: A panorama of Australia, moving from Western Australia through South Australia, Tasmania, Victoria, the A.C.T., N.S.W. and Queensland. Scenes include timber getting, gold mining, grape and apple harvests, dairying, skiing, Federal Parliament, Sydney attractions, Blue Mountains, caves and beaches, cane cutting and the Great Barrier Reef.
